taskGroup.name: Upgrading Liferay projects to Liferay Portal 6.2
taskGroup.intro:
This cheat sheet will guide you through the individual steps necessary to update Liferay portlets, hooks, layout templates, themes to the latest version of Liferay Portal version 6.2.
To assist you along the way, wizards and commands will be available for you to launch automatically. If at any time you run into issues, please visit the Liferay IDE forums url listed below:
http://www.liferay.com/community/forums/-/message_boards/category/4627757
taskGroup.onCompletion:
Congratulations! You have just updated your projects to Liferay Portal 6.2. For any issues please visit the Liferay IDE community forums page listed below and post a new thread with any issues encountered.
http://www.liferay.com/community/forums/-/message_boards/category/4627757
